text: 6.2 Jon 7.15 Am mɨdɨl Juda añɨŋ lep ñɨn awl ak apek, Juda apnan gɨpal kal ak amɨl, binɨb kuŋay ap yelak okok kɨlop takaw agñak. Agñaknɨŋ, nɨŋɨd ju dɨl wal agɨl agɨlak, Takaw anɨb ak akal nɨb nɨŋɨd anɨb agup agɨlak? Gos teplep akal nɨb nɨgup, tɨtay gɨl dup agɨlak? Tap mageptek taydɨl gup agɨlak?
